name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory, default is Magic Home Sync

host_ip.title: Host IP
host_ip.description: The IP address of the host display that is running the sync progam.

host_port.title: Port
host_port.description: The host display port, default is 6006.

light_ip.title: Light IP
light_ip.description: The IP address of the light to be synced with the host.

light_type.title: Light type
light_type.description: The Magic Home device type, being either RGB, RGBW or RGBWW, default is RGBW.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: Interval in seconds that the lights are updated in, default is 1.
